page.title: 14Rendcomb Col.Playing field
page.content: In education the only item in this area is Rendcomb Col. playing field.There are many rollers,some of1.5 tonnes weight,mowers(towed or pushed),painting machines,spikers pesticide spraying equipment.Hard brushes that rotate are used for the sports ground.The area of the land is 7 hectares which includes 3 cricket squares,a pavilion & 2 scoreboards.The school has 5 teams & the 1st XI square played 62 games last season.There are 9 hockey & 8 rugby pitches for sport.During the rest of the year rugby posts have to be painted & pitches marked out. The groundsman is making a golf course for the 250 pupils.The school offers a wide range of recreation including judo sailing squash basketball tennis hockey rugby cricket archery badminton & netball for the girls.
